gr.interamerican.bo2.utils
Class TemplateUtils

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.TemplateUtils

public class TemplateUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides utilities that make it easier to modify template files. A template file is a file that has some placeholders for values.

replace

public static java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String template,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String value)
Replaces a variable. If the name of the variable starts with a lower case character, then we also search for instances of the variable starting with a capital letter, and we replace the value with the first letter capital as well.

Parameters:
template -
name - name of the variable
value -
Returns:
Returns the text of the template.

fill

public static java.lang.String fill(java.lang.String template,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> variables)
Fills the specified template, by replacing the variables with their values, as defined in the specified map.

Parameters:
template - Template.
variables - Map with variable names being the keys and values being the corresponding value of each variable.
Returns:
Returns the template filled.

nullSafeFill

public static java.lang.String nullSafeFill(java.lang.String template,
                                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> variables)
Fills the specified template, by replacing the variables with their values, as defined in the specified map. If the template is null, returns null.

Parameters:
template - Template.
variables - Map with variable names being the keys and values being the corresponding value of each variable.
Returns:
Returns the template filled.
